英文法規名稱: The Regulations Governing the Scope of Core Business revenues from the Banking and Insurance Business of the Banking and Insurance Industries
中文法規名稱: 銀行業保險業經營銀行保險本業收入範圍認定辦法
沿革內容:
1.Promulgated by the Ministry of Finance on 14 July 2014 under Decree No. 10300620380 and effective as of 1 July 2014.
2.A Total of 3 articles were amended and promulgated on 6 May 2015, by the Decree No. 10400575830 of the Ministry of Finance and effective from 1 March 2015.

法規內容.條文內容: The Regulations herein are set forth pursuant to Paragraph 2, Article 11 of the Value-Added and Non-Value-Added Business Tax Act.

Core business revenues from the banking and insurance business of the banking and insurance industries shall be revenues separated from those listed below:
1.The non-core business revenues prescribed under Article 3 of the Regulations Governing the Scope of Non-Core Business Income of Banking, Insurance, Trust Investment, Securities, Futures, Commercial paper, and Pawn-Broking Businesses.
2.The revenues from underwriting, dealing, commission agency, brokerage, agency of securities prescribed under Article 15 of the Securities and Exchange Act.
3.The revenues from futures trading prescribed under Article 3 of the Futures Trading Act.
4.The revenues from certifying, underwriting, brokering and trading of short-term bills or financial bonds prescribed under Article 21 of the Act Governing Bills Finance Business.
5.The revenues from trust of money, trust of loans and related security interests, trust of securities prescribed under Article 16 of the Trust Enterprise Act.
6.The revenues from agency fee, commission or processing fee from insurance agent, negotiates an insurance contract or provides related services as prescribed under Articles 8 and 9 of the Insurance Act.
These Regulations shall take effect as of 1 March 1 2015.
